thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: David Hughes
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by David Hughes

author: David Hughes
title: David Hughes
text: We purchased the 14 day Greencar JR pass and we were really happy with the way the system worked. We were able to reserve seats easily at each railway station and also received great assistance from the customer service staff who were very knowledgeable. The trains were very clean and comfortable and ran on time and we wished we had the same efficient system in Australia.
